page.title: 15Blackmore's Bookshop
page.content: The shop is about 200 years old. Before it was a{bookshoo}it was a {paint and decorators}shop which was called Chibbets. In the year 1976 it was changed from Chibbets to Blackmore's Bookshop. This bookshop is named after a bookshop in London also called Blackmore's Bookshop. The{cobbled yard}has the original cobbles which were put there the year it was built. The floor in the Bookshop is very uneven because it is made up{old red flagstones}which were put there the year it was built. The counter is made of{solid oak}which is very heavy. It was used when the paint and decorators shop was there. The{handles on the doors}are made of brass which are not used very often nowadays.
